text_block_list.text: I couldn't sleep so I decided to take an early morning walk along the riverside. ――I knew why I couldn't sleep though.
It was because of Katsuragi Ace. Those piercing eyes, without an ounce of self-doubt. And――

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Someday…… it'll be all of you chasing after my back……!
And those words. A strong, clear determination, and winner's mentality.
While there were many who admired Mr. C.B., Katsuragi Ace was overlooked.
Even with that, there was no shadow of doubt in her eyes. The reason I couldn't sleep……was because I couldn't think of anything but those eyes.
I took a deep breath. Katsuragi Ace, she didn't waver in the slightest when facing the words of others, unlike me.
choice_data_list: I wonder what her dream is……

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: HaaaAAAAAAA!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Haa. Damn……like this, I won't even make it to the goal……!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: But, it's not enough. I need to run, more and more and more……I need to pull even farther away from them……!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: No matter who they are……far enough that they can't reach……!
I followed that voice. I found Katsuragi Ace, just like yesterday, breathing heavily.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Hm? Did you need something? ……Oh, that badge. A trainer from Tracen Academy?
I nodded while looking at Katsuragi Ace. ……she was drenched in sweat. Was she training this early in the morning?

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Heeey~, why do you keep starin'? Did you fall for me~?

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Hahaa, it was a joke!
She gave off a different impression than when she was running. The way Katsuragi Ace was looking at me, gave a very casual impression.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: And? Did you need something from me?
I had called out to her unintentionally, but it was true there was something I wanted to ask her. Back then――why was she able to remain so composed.
But, this was the first time we'd talked. Asking her something like that seemed rude……so I was a little hesitant.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: You've got a really serious look on your face. ……is something bothering you?

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Well, for now start by not looking at the ground! C'mon, I'll hear you out. Look me in the eyes. Okay?
Did she realize I was hesitating? Taking Katsuragi Ace up on her offer, I decided to ask.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Why, you ask……it's obvious isn't it? It's because I came here to win.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Without that, then there'd be no reason for me to leave my hometown and come all the way out here on my own.
Katsuragi Ace laughed it off like it was nothing. Then, the words and gaze she directed at the others――

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: I am though. More than you think.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: There's no way I wouldn't be! I'm as frustrated as anyone could be! To them, I'm not even worth their attention, after all.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: But you see, worrying about their opinions and backing away from my dream would be stupid, right?

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Because I have at least that much resolve, I'm still standing here!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: You too, since you're a Trainer at Tracen Academy, even though our positions might be different, you've got at least that much determination, right?
I fell silent. Even if I wanted to answer "Of course", I still hadn't straightened out my own feelings.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Besides, you were watching that race yesterday, right? C.B.'s running was something else, wasn't it!?

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Her running seems so free, and so unrestrained……! A run that nobody else can take hold of!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: I can understand why she's the center of attention.
It seemed like Katsuragi Ace admired Mr. C.B. I wanted to nod in agreement with her words too, but――

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: That's exactly why, when I start thinking that someday she'll be the one to cross the goal behind me……

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: ……I can't help but get excited!
Katsuragi Ace let out a simple laugh. But her eyes burned with passion.
It was like she was looking ahead at a distant place, and that her path was clear――

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Hahaa, that might be a little wrong! My dream lies beyond that. Surpassing those I admire……is just part of it.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Yeah. There's still a long road ahead though. If I keep running, someday I'll reach it. I'll surpass it. For sure.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: I'll turn it around. Eventually――all of it.
I could feel the strong fire behind those eyes. I couldn't help but gasp.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: ――Oh, my bad! I need to wrap up my training. If you still want to talk about more, then it'll have to wait until next time.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Don't worry about it! ……Oh. Seems like you know my name already, but I guess I should still introduce myself.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: I'm Katsuragi Ace.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: The Uma Musume who'll surpass common sense, and overcome any obstacles to become the strongest Ace!
